definition: to cajole/to sweet talk sb into doing sth
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
roar of laughter (onom.)/hubbub/to roar (as a crowd)

to cheat/to swindle/to deceive/to get on (a horse etc) by swinging one leg over
